title: Please Help!! Personal account gifting error!!!
body:
Hey Riot and fellow summoners. 

I need some help pronto for this problem. I don't know what to do to fix it, as the problem is only linked to this account. I can login to my alternate accounts on this device and still be able to gift, and other devices have the error when I use this account. What basically happens is, I open to the gifting page and it loads (somewhat) but instead of coming up with a list of people I can gift it comes up with "Redirecting you to the BYOD SSL certificate install page" followed by a black client, and when I highlight it, the words "DNS error" followed by a description come up. Can I please get some help as soon as possible for this issue, since it is EXTREMELY annoying, considering I want to give a friend a birthday present through a P"urf"ect surprise. 

Thanks for reading, 
-Lotus

Links: (in case of some error)
http://i.imgur.com/mkDWh5U.jpg?1 (byod certificate error)
http://i.imgur.com/sLQI9fg.png?1 (black screen + writing)

replies.body: That seems weird. Have you tried [changing your DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)?
